mm_dntme_help_global_defaults.message: These settings apply to all websites you visit.

mm_dntme_help_shouldsenderrorreports.message: To help us improve the product, enabling this preference sends anonymous error and usage data to our servers.

mm_dntme_help_showintheknowgrowls.message: Notifies you of websites that have suffered a data breach (on the top right of your browser screen) as you browse the web.

mm_dntme_help_showmedals.message: Privacy Medals are meant to be a fun form of encouragement for stopping lots of trackers.

mm_dntme_help_shownotifications.message: DoNotTrackMe occasionally shows notifications on the top right of your browser screen (like when you create a new Masked Email).

mm_dntme_help_showsearchtrackerinfo.message: Displays the number of trackers detected on a site linked from a search result.

mm_dntme_help_showtrackersonload.message: Displays the number of trackers blocked for every website (on the top right of your browser screen) as you browse the web.

mm_dntme_help_showweeklyreports.message: A summary report of your blocked trackers is presented to you every Sunday.

mm_dntme_help_suggestaddresses.message: Suggest filling your address into form fields.

mm_dntme_help_suggestions.message: Based on user feedback we sometimes unblock certain trackers by default to allow some websites to function properly.

mm_payment_error.message: Sorry for the interruption, but something went wrong. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_abine.message: Oops! There's been a serious error. Please try again, and contact us ASAP.

mm_payment_error_banned_domain.message: Sorry for the inconvenience, but due to website-specific restrictions, you cannot used Masked Cards on $1. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_billing.message: Sorry, but we weren't able to charge your card on file. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_declined.message: Sorry, but we weren't able to charge your card on file. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_duplicate_card_ban.message: Sorry, but your account has been restricted due to using a credit card tied to a previous account in our system. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_global_limit.message: Sorry, you have reached a temporary limit on creating Masked Cards. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_grey_listed.message: Sorry for the interruption, but we need you to verify your card on file before creating any more Masked Cards. Verify now.

mm_payment_error_hard_limit.message: Sorry, but there’s an issue with your account. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_high_risk_country.message: Sorry, but Masked Cards are only available to U.S. users at this time. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_provider.message: Sorry, but we’re having difficulty creating a Masked Card for you here. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_refund.message: Sorry! There was an error closing your card. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_rejected_domain.message: Sorry for the inconvenience, but due to website-specific restrictions, you cannot used Masked Cards on $1. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

mm_payment_error_soft_limit.message: Sorry for the interruption, but we need you to verify your card on file before creating any more Masked Cards. Verify now.

mm_payment_error_validation_input.message: Sorry, the amount must be a valid amount in dollars and cents.

mm_payment_error_validation_max.message: Sorry, but you can’t create a Masked Card for greater than $1 because you haven’t verified your card on file yet. To increase this limit, verify your card.

mm_payment_error_validation_min.message: Sorry, but you can’t create a Masked Card for under $1. But don’t worry: you can make a $1 card and then close the card to refund what you don’t spend.

mm_payment_error_validation_verified.message: Sorry, but you can’t create a Masked Card for that amount. The amount must be between $1 and $2.

mm_payment_error_verified_soft_limit.message: Sorry for the interruption, but you’ve reached a temporary limit on your Masked Cards. Chat with us live between 9 AM - 5 PM EST or contact us so we can help.

We apologize, but Masked Cards are currently only available to U.S. users. International support will arrive in 2014. Please note that Masked Phones is still available outside of the U.S.
